title: Worst predictions from 2015 & Listener Questions!
itunes:title: Worst predictions from 2015 & Listener Questions!
description:
A room filled with heroes - Chris Wesseling, Marc Sessler and Colleen Wolfe discuss the latest news from the NFL, including the beef between DeAngelo Williams and Vontaze Burfict. The heroes then dive into Colleen’s 2016 Draft All-Name Team article and share their favorite name from the 2016 NFL Draft. Finally, they wrap the show sharing their worst predictions from last year and answering listener questions!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
